animeDescription: Irvine Lester is an AT repairman. In order to make a living with his sister, he is secretly fighting in AT gambling matches and intentionally losing the games for money. But the other fighters find out about his excellent AT maneuvering skills and demand a real match.
animeRelated: ['Soukou Kihei Votoms', 'Soukou Kihei Votoms: Case;Irvine - Tenmatsu']
animeStaff: [['Igarashi Shishou', ['Director']], ['Tanaka Kazuya', ['Sound Director']], ['Takahashi Ryousuke', ['Original Creator']], ['Hayashi Yuuichirou', ['Key Animation']]]
